description: This file sets up an AI agent using the OpenAIChat model, runs a streaming chat request with a horror story prompt, and prints the streamed response chunks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with OpenAI models, capable of running chat prompts and streaming responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the streaming response from the agent.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class representing the OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Executes a chat prompt with streaming enabled, returning an iterator over response events.

methods.name: Agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Prints the response of a chat prompt asynchronously.
